text: Uzbek (O'zbek tili or O'zbekcha in Latin script, Ўзбек тили or Ўзбекча in Cyrillic script, أۇزبېك تیلی in Arabic script) is a Turkic language. It is the official language of Uzbekistan. It has about 40 million native speakers. It is spoken by the Uzbeks in Uzbekistan and elsewhere in Central Asia. Uzbek belongs to the southeastern Turkic or Karluk family of Turkic languages. ==References== Category:Languages of Russia Category:Languages of Tajikistan Category:Languages of Turkmenistan Category:Languages of Uzbekistan Category:Languages of China Category:Turkic languages
title: Uzbek language
